Blog: An Unusual Public Servant's Observations

Hi, my name is Abhi Nemani, and I'm a fan of technology, government, and interesting ideas. So I've been thinking about things, ranging from political philosophy and cities to data-driven policy and civic tech, and I have gotten the opportunity to travel around the world to see first-hand how public life everywhere is changing — which makes me excited about what's ahead.
